channel.title: Remix my song ‘Trusts’
channel.description:
Hi, my name is Jeff (don’t get started with the memes). I’d used Auxy for nearly a year now. I found it useful and interesting that you can make music just using your phone. Here’s a track that I made. I want you to remix it. Any genre, any tempo. Hope you like it.
also, it’s chill https://app.auxy.co/projects/Tg-MDtWAjqGCUR6sWl7pFA==
Ok? cool!

item.title: Remix my song ‘Trusts’
item.dc:creator: Phoenix
item.description:
Want someone to remix or add to your track? Post it here! Work in Progress
If you have a track that you want to let others remix or add to, please post the project link in this thread instead of creating a new topic. Also, before posting your project, think about whether you’ve actually created something worth adding to so that we don’t end up with hundreds of unfinished tracks that no one wants to remix. If you think it’s a better idea, we could also setup a separate area where people can post new topics freely about track remixes etc. Whatever you like the most!

Read full topic
